channel.title: How can i
channel.description: How come the haybales dont give def xp.. this is the only error

item.title: How can i
item.dc:creator: @ShIzNeT ShIzNeT
item.description:
@ShIzNeT wrote:

Search for “You start hitting the door” no quotes" and after “break;” hit enter and paste this.

case 299: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("All that prickling got you some Defense exp!"); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x320); addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[1]), 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

Read full topic
